spearheadEnhancements.name: Steelshell Armour
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This pearlescent armour offers uncanny protection, regardless of the strength behind the blows that strike it.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Ignore all modifiers to save rolls for your general (positive and negative).

spearheadEnhancements.name: Arch-Ritualist
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This general is a master at manipulating the ethersea to conceal the approach of their forces.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to rolls for your general’s ‘Ritual of the Creeping Mist’ ability.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Mind Flare
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
spearheadEnhancements.lore: A brilliant pulse of bioluminescence suddenly illuminates the gloom of the ethersea, temporarily blinding those unprepared for it.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with your general.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Until the end of the phase, attacks made by that unit only score hits on unmodified hit rolls of 6.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Delicious Morsels
spearheadEnhancements.lore: This general carries with them rare crustaceans favoured by Allopexes and Fangmora Eels.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: **Heal (1)** each friendly ****CAVALRY**** unit within your general’s combat range.

regimentAbilities.name: Way of the Cresting Wave
regimentAbilities.lore: The Thralls of this raiding party have been trained in techniques that see them strike like a tsunami.
regimentAbilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly ****Namarti** Thralls** units that charged in the same turn.

regimentAbilities.name: Ethersea Predators
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
regimentAbilities.lore: The deep-sea beasts these warriors ride are driven into a feeding frenzy during battle.
regimentAbilities.effect: Pick a friendly ****CAVALRY**** unit that used a ****FIGHT**** ability this turn. **Heal (D3)** that unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Delicious Morsels
artefactsOfPower.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Any Movement Phase
artefactsOfPower.lore: This hero carries with them rare crustaceans favoured by Allopexes and Fangmora Eels.
artefactsOfPower.effect: **Heal (D3)** each friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN **CAVALRY**** unit within this unit’s combat range.

artefactsOfPower.name: Dritchleech
artefactsOfPower.lore: Incredibly rare, these worms feed upon magic and are capable of draining arcane energies.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy **WIZARDS** while they are within 18" of this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Armour of the Cythai
artefactsOfPower.lore: This gleaming panoply was given by Teclis to the ancestors of the Idoneth. Upon the command of its bearer, it can radiate the power of Hysh – a fitting property for a gift from the Great Illuminator.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks that target this unit have no effect.

battleTraits.name: Raiders from the Deep
battleTraits.lore: The Idoneth Deepkin are merciless reavers, as cold and cruel as the abyssal depths that they call home. They surge forth on a tide of ocean magic, striking out across the lands in search of souls to raid.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN** unit that is **travelling the** **ethersea** to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit on the battlefield wholly within 9" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Ethersea Voyagers
battleTraits.lore: The Idoneth spend their entire lives in the ocean depths, emerging for one reason only: to enact raids on the land-dwelling races.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly regiment led by an **IDONETH DEEPKIN **HERO****. No units in that regiment can have already been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up those units in reserve **travelling the ethersea**. They have now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Tides of Death
battleTraits.lore: The Idoneth Deepkin destroy their enemies like the relentless tides of a perilous sea, building up their attack to a crashing crescendo and then receding to leave nothing but death in their wake.
battleTraits.effect:
A different effect applies to friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN** units each battle round, as shown below. For the fifth battle round onwards, repeat the sequence, starting with ‘Low Tide’.

**Battle Round 1:**
***Low Tide:*** For the rest of the battle round, subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target this unit and subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target this unit if it did not use any ****CHARGE**** abilities this turn.

**Battle Round 2:**
***Flood Tide:*** For the rest of the battle round, this unit can use a ****RUN**** ability and still use ****SHOOT**** and/or ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn.

**Battle Round 3:**
***High Tide:*** For the rest of the battle round, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST**.

**Battle Round 4:**
***Ebb Tide:*** For the rest of the battle round, this unit can use a ****RETREAT**** ability and still use ****SHOOT**** and/or ****CHARGE**** abilities later in the turn. In addition, for the rest of the battle round, no mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by ****RETREAT**** abilities.

heroicTraits.name: Ancient Pride
heroicTraits.lore: This champion fights with the stubborn skill of a thousand Idoneth souls.
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified hit roll for a combat **attack** that targets this unit is 1-3, the **attack** fails and the **attack** sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Hunter of Souls
heroicTraits.lore: This hero seeks neither glory nor territory; their only interest is the capture of potent souls.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit’s melee weapons have **Anti‑**HERO** (+1 Rend)**.

heroicTraits.name: Nightmare Legacy
heroicTraits.lore: The repressed horror of the Idoneth’s long incarceration emanates from this dark-visaged warrior in palpable waves of doom.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by an ability used by this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Subtract D6 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Pressure of the Deep
abilities.lore: The wizard enfolds their victims in a shimmering bubble of crushing force.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Steed of Tides
abilities.lore: The wizard conjures a watery elemental to transport comrades through the ethersea.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Arcane Corrasion
abilities.lore: The spellcaster pushes forth a wave of aetheric energy that picks particles up off the ground and hurls them at the foe, dulling their weapons.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Surge Forward
abilities.lore: The Namarti are the lowest caste in Idoneth society, but when formed into a Namarti Corps and led to battle by their Akhelian masters, they strike swiftly and with devastating effect.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll run rolls and charge rolls for friendly **NAMARTI** units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly **AKHELIAN** unit.

abilities.name: Fade Like Mist
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, End of Your Turn
abilities.lore: The Soul-raid Ambushers are experts in hit-and-run tactics, riding the currents of the ethersea to strike the foe from new directions.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **IDONETH DEEPKIN INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit wholly within 3" of a terrain feature.
abilities.effect: Remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up in reserve **travelling the ethersea** (see the ‘Raiders from the Deep’ ability).

abilities.name: Ferocious Predators
abilities.lore: With the aid of the Embailors, the Akhelian Beastmasters are able to seize control of their creatures’ predatory consciousness and turn them into truly terrifying weapons of war.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made with **Companion** weapons by friendly **AKHELIAN** units.

abilities.name: Wisdom of the Deep
abilities.lore: The Isharann are born with a talent for harnessing arcane forces. This power is only amplified when these aelves convene an Isharann Council and head to war.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls, Isharann ritual rolls and lurelight rolls for friendly **ISHARANN** units while they are within the combat ranges of any other friendly **ISHARANN** units.
